itunes:title: Promises of God Week 3 with Ellie Holcomb
title: Promises of God Week 3 with Ellie Holcomb
description:
During this third and final week of our Promises of God series, Raechel and Amanda are joined by special guest Ellie Holcomb. Ellie is a prolific singer-songwriter, beloved children’s book author, and longtime friend of She Reads Truth, her music serving as SRT’s unofficial soundtrack over the years. Together, they talk about the “already and not yet” of God’s promises, the art of fighting fear with Truth, and what it looks like to choose feasting over famine. God’s promises are trustworthy—an anchor for our souls even amidst the unknown. 

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 3 of the She Reads Truth Promises of God reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Promises of God collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Save 15% on your first Subscription Box when you use the code BOX15.

Take a quick podcast survey.

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/promises-of-god-week-3-with-ellie-holcomb/
